count.title: Count
count.description: How many users should be generated in total.  This setting does not apply to the purchases or products stream.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Manually control the faker random seed to return the same values on subsequent runs (leave -1 for random)

records_per_slice.title: Records Per Stream Slice
records_per_slice.description: How many fake records will be in each page (stream slice), before a state message is emitted?

always_updated.title: Always Updated
always_updated.description: Should the updated_at values for every record be new each sync?  Setting this to false will case the source to stop emitting records after COUNT records have been emitted.

parallelism.title: Parallelism
parallelism.description: How many parallel workers should we use to generate fake data?  Choose a value equal to the number of CPUs you will allocate to this source.
